meanings.definition: Gathered into a mass or cluster
meanings.sent1: The agglomerated rocks formed a large pile in the yard.
meanings.sent2: The agglomerated snowflakes created a beautiful snowball.
meanings.sent3: The agglomerated toys in the box looked like a colorful mountain.
meanings.sent4: The agglomerated stars in the sky shone brightly together.
meanings.sent5: The agglomerated leaves on the ground made a crunchy carpet.

meanings.definition: Formed by the collection of particles into a mass
meanings.sent1: The agglomerated dust on the shelf needed cleaning.
meanings.sent2: The agglomerated sugar crystals made the dessert sweet.
meanings.sent3: The agglomerated books on the shelf seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The agglomerated thoughts in his mind were hard to separate.
meanings.sent5: The agglomerated clouds in the sky looked like fluffy cotton balls.
